thread.title: Franklin Graham Slams Christianity Today Over "Asian Jesus," UN Urges Biden to Nix Title IX, Hobby Lobby's Christmas Tradition
thread.title_full: Franklin Graham Slams Christianity Today Over "Asian Jesus," UN Urges Biden to Nix Title IX, Hobby Lobby's Christmas Tradition

author: @ChristianPost
title: Franklin Graham Slams Christianity Today Over "Asian Jesus," UN Urges Biden to Nix Title IX, Hobby Lobby's Christmas Tradition
text: Franklin Graham Slams Christianity Today Over "Asian Jesus," UN Urges Biden To Nix Title IX, Hobby Lobby's Christmas Tradition [Subscribe here for Season 3 of Generation Indoctrination](https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/generation-indoctrination-inside-the-transgender-battle/id1648997407) Top headlines for Friday, December 29, 2023 In this episode, we address contentious feedback from Evangelist Franklin Graham, who took issue with the claim by Christianity Today that Jesus Christ was Asian, a claim made in an article of the magazine founded by his father. Next, we explore the recent scrutiny of London's Tavistock gender clinic where over a decade, a reported 70 children as young as 3 and 4 were referred for 'gender-affirming' interventions. Lastly, we touch on the chain retailer Hobby Lobby's annual tradition of distributing a Christmas message in newspapers across the United States - a practice nearly 30 years in the making.
